front.title: Label Switched Path (LSP) Ping Extended Bidirectional Forwarding Detection (BFD) Discriminator TLV

abstract.t: This document defines an extended Bidirectional Forwarding Detection (BFD) discriminator TLV for the Multiprotocol Label Switching (MPLS) Label Switched Path (LSP) Ping mechanism, to allow bootstrapping of multiple BFD sessions for a given FEC.
